system.description:
Paralyzes a humanoid, rendering them unable to move or act. The target can repeat the save each round to break free.

Scaling: At dice count 3, can affect 2 humanoids. At dice count 6, works on any creature type. At dice count 9, paralysis is harder to resist. At dice count 12, can affect multiple creatures. At dice count 15, creates a zone of paralysis.
